entry.title: Shelly Plus setup and Home Assistant integration

link.title: Shelly Plus setup and Home Assistant integration

entry.content:
Intro

Starting with the Shelly Pro 4PM and the Shelly Plus 1 / 1PM not long thereafter, Allterco launched a second generation of Shelly devices. These devices are based on the more powerful ESP32 (compared to the ESP8266 in the 1st Gen devices) and …
